Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of design outputs compared to the design specifications.
Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Designs / Total Designs) * 100

Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures how well actual costs for mechanical design adhere to the budgeted costs.
Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: (Actual Mechanical Design Cost / Budgeted Mechanical Design Cost) * 100

Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score for mechanical designs.

Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of planned tests that are completed within the test schedule.
Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Tests / Total Number of Tests Planned) * 100

Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken to complete all planned tests for a product or design.
Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Testing / Number of Tests Completed

Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: (Number of Defects Detected / Total Units Tested) * 100

Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Validations / Total Validations Attempted) * 100

Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of tests that need to be repeated or corrected due to initial failures.

Product Development+Engineering.EXPLANATION: Measures the average customer satisfaction score with the products after testing.
Product Development+Engineering.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings for Tested Products / Number of Customers)
